title: The Impostor (1927 film)
summary: The Impostor (German: Die Hochstaplerin) is a 1927 German silent film directed by Martin Berger and starring Ruth Weyher, Anton Pointner and Philipp Manning.The film's sets were designed by the art director Otto Erdmann and Hans Sohnle.
content:
The Impostor (German: Die Hochstaplerin) is a 1927 German silent film directed by Martin Berger and starring Ruth Weyher, Anton Pointner and Philipp Manning.The film's sets were designed by the art director Otto Erdmann and Hans Sohnle.


== Cast ==
Ruth Weyher as Die Hochstaplerin Baronin Neruda
Anton Pointner as Ihr Freund, von Torelli
Philipp Manning as Geschäftsfreund
Theodor Loos as Prof. Gehrsdorf
Margarete Lanner as Edith Bernau
Ernst Rückert as Gutsbesitzer Wothe
Fritz Alberti as Förster
Bruno Arno as Zuhöhrer
Sophie Pagay as Gehrsdorfs Wirtschaftlerin
Paul Graetz as Juwelier
Erna Rima as Kellnerin
Dagmar Murzewa as Frau des Förters


== References ==


== Bibliography ==
Paul Matthew St. Pierre. Cinematography in the Weimar Republic: Lola Lola, Dirty Singles, and the Men Who Shot Them. Rowman & Littlefield, 2016.

The Impostor at IMDb
